title: Game Boy Titles Coming to Nintendo Switch!? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.03.21
description:
Blessing and Tim talk about Game Boy and Game Boy Color games coming to Nintendo Switch Online, bad news for the semiconductor shortage, and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:35 - Housekeeping
Monday is labor day which means that we’re off! Tim, what does that mean for content
A new episode of The Blessing Show is out and it’s ALL about EA Sports Big and it features multiple cameos that you don’t want to miss.
It’s SUB-TEMBER on Twitch! Viewers across the platform throughout the month can take advantage of 20% off subscriptions for first-time subscribers and gifted subs. Your support means the world to us here at Kinda Funny and right now you can take advantage of this deal and receive benefits like ad-free viewing, sub emotes, and more.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers Black Jack & The Kinda Funny Destiny 2 PC Clan
The Roper Report   -
00:07:50 - Game Boy and Game Boy Color titles are headed to Nintendo Switch Online - Tom Phillips @ Eurogamer
00:17:45 - Toshiba Warns Power-Chip Supply to Stay Tight for Another Year - Takashi Mochizuki @ Bloomberg
00:22:35 - Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl Release Date Seemingly Leaks - Taylor Lyles @ IGN
00:30:47 -  Ad
00:32:11 - The artist behind Jet Set Radio has returned to Sega - Andy Robinson @ VGC
00:37:30 - Shang-Chi has joined Fortnite! - Mark Delaney @ GameSpot
00:42:15 - Out today
00:47:40 - You‘re Wrong
